text: Dustin Aaron Moskovitz (/ˈmɒskəvɪts/; born May 22, 1984) is an American billionaire entrepreneur. He is most famous for being a co-founder of Meta Platforms (previously Facebook, Inc.). He also founded the software company Asana. == Education == Moskovitz holds a bachelor's degree in economics from Harvard University. == Personal life == Moskovitz is married to Cari Tuna. Tuna is a journalist for The Wall Street Journal In United States. == References == Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Florida Category:People from Gainesville, Florida
title: Dustin Moskovitz
